description: A minimalistic, safe, and chat oriented, markdown-ish utility.
name: lightdown

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min && npm test
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = lightdown;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default lightdown;' >> esm/index.js
